title: Chocolate 🍫 Banana 🍌 Milkshake 👌 | Cold Beverage | Summer 🌞Treat
content:
Cold Beverage: Milkshake Servings: 2 Duration: 10 mins Let’s start with Ingredients and follows Procedure Ingredients:
  • Ripped Banana - 2 - chopped
  • Semi sweet Chocolate Morsels - 2 tb sp - melted
  • Sugar – 1 tb sp
  • Honey – 1 tb sp
  • Milk – cold – 400 ml
  • Vanilla essence – 1/2 tsp
  • Chocolate chips – few – Garnish ( optional )
  • Banana slice -  garnish ( optional )
Procedure:
  • Add all ingredients in juicer
  • Select Milkshake option
  • Blend till frothy and smooth
  • Adjust sweetness according to taste
  • Serve cold beverage in summer / at morning/ for kids at evening
  • Enjoy this summer with Milkshake , Happy cooking and have a good day 🙂
